channel.title: How to convert GVP (google video player) to AVI! [Pics]
channel.description:
[center]Ello, And welcome![/center] [center]Ever wondered on how to convert that Google video to AVI? Well you come to the Right Spot![/center] [center]This is an Easy 4 step Tutorial![/center]
[left][b]Step One[/b][/left] [left]First Let's go to www.video.google.com [/left] [left]Find the Video you want and Click download![/left] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img119.imageshack.us/img119/3189/downloaddx6.png[/img][/URL] [left]And save it to your desktop.[/left]
[left][b]Step Two[/b][/left] [left]Once saved to your desktop Right-Click it and Open with notepad[/left] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/7251/openwithxv3.png[/img][/URL] [left]Turn on Wordwrap by going to File and clicking on it, it should now have a check next to it[/left]
[left][b]Step Three.[/b][/left] [left]Now you should have a bunch of Jibberish All we want is the URL[/left] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/7739/urlpa1.png[/img][/URL] [left]Now copy it![/left]
[left][b]Step Four.[/b][/left] [left]Now Paste it in your address bar[/left] [left]The file should now start downloading[/left] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img128.imageshack.us/img128/8749/dlle7.png[/img][/URL] [center][u]Congratulations, You've now just converted a GVP to an AVI with no programs[/u][/center] [center]100% Creds to meh =D[/center]

item.title: How to convert GVP (google video player) to AVI! [Pics]
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

[center]Ello, And welcome![/center]
[center]Ever wondered on how to convert that Google video to AVI? Well you come to the Right Spot![/center]
[center]This is an Easy 4 step Tutorial![/center]

[left]Step One[/left]
[left]First Let’s go to www.video.google.com [/left]
[left]Find the Video you want and Click download![/left]

[left]And save it to your desktop.[/left]

[left]Step Two[/left]
[left]Once saved to your desktop Right-Click it and Open with notepad[/left]

[left]Turn on Wordwrap by going to File and clicking on it, it should now have a check next to it[/left]

[left]Step Three.[/left]
[left]Now you should have a bunch of Jibberish All we want is the URL[/left]

[left]Now copy it![/left]

[left]Step Four.[/left]
[left]Now Paste it in your address bar[/left]
[left]The file should now start downloading[/left]

[center]Congratulations, You’ve now just converted a GVP to an AVI with no programs[/center]
[center]100% Creds to meh =D[/center]

Read full topic
